A pipeline for running Cell Ranger mapping.

## Argument group

### Arguments



|Name            |Description                      |Attributes                                    |
|:---------------|:--------------------------------|:---------------------------------------------|
|`--id`          |ID of the sample.                |`string`, required, example: "foo"            |
|`--input`       |A fastq file.                    |`file`, required, example: "data.fastq"       |
|`--reference`   |Path to a Cell Ranger reference. |`file`, required, example: "reference.tar.gz" |
|`--output_raw`  |The raw output folder.           |`file`, required, example: "output_dir"       |
|`--output_h5mu` |The converted h5mu file.         |`file`, required, example: "output.h5mu"      |
